snippet.title: Brothers: A Tale of two Sons Remake | Launch Trailer [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Brothers: A Tale Of Two Sons Remake is now available! Remade with updated graphics, smoother controls and newly recorded music, Brothers is ready for a new generation of gaming on Steam, Epic, GOG, PS5 and Xbox X&S. 

Whether you are playing for the first time or experiencing it again, you won't want to miss this lovingly remade classic. 

It's an experience you'll never forget. 

Buy Now: https://BrothersTheGame.com 

Stay up to date with the latest news from these 505 Games lands by following us across our community channels:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games

Instagram: https://instagram.com/505_games

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/505games
